verses.verse: עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on מִשְׁכָּבִי֙ <WH4904> mish-ka-Vi on my bed בַּלֵּיל֔וֹת <WH3915> bal-lei-Lot, By night בִּקַּ֕שְׁתִּי <WH1245> bik-Kash-ti I sought אֵ֥ת <WH853> 'et שֶׁאָהֲבָ֖ה <WH157> she-'a-ha-Vah loveth נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> naf-Shi; him whom my soul בִּקַּשְׁתִּ֖יו <WH1245> bik-kash-Tiv I sought וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo did not מְצָאתִֽיו׃ <WH4672> me-tza-Tiv. him but I found

אָק֨וּמָה <WH6965> 'a-Ku-mah I will rise נָּ֜א <WH4994> na now וַאֲסוֹבְבָ֣ה <WH5437> va-'a-sov-Vah now and go about בָעִ֗יר <WH5892> va-'Ir, the city בַּשְּׁוָקִים֙ <WH7784> bash-she-va-Kim in the streets וּבָ֣רְחֹב֔וֹת <WH7339> u-Va-re-cho-Vot, and in the broad ways אֲבַקְשָׁ֕ה <WH1245> 'a-vak-Shah I will seek אֵ֥ת <WH853> 'et שֶׁאָהֲבָ֖ה <WH157> she-'a-ha-Vah loveth נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> naf-Shi; him whom my soul בִּקַּשְׁתִּ֖יו <WH1245> bik-kash-Tiv I sought וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo did not מְצָאתִֽיו׃ <WH4672> me-tza-Tiv. him but I found

מְצָא֙וּנִי֙ <WH4672> me-tza-'U-ni found הַשֹּׁ֣מְרִ֔ים <WH8104> hash-Sho-me-Rim, The watchmen הַסֹּבְבִ֖ים <WH5437> has-soe-Vim that go about בָּעִ֑יר <WH5892> ba-'Ir; the city אֵ֛ת <WH853> 'et שֶׁאָהֲבָ֥ה <WH157> she-'a-ha-Vah loveth נַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> naf-Shi ye him whom my soul רְאִיתֶֽם׃ <WH7200> re-'i-Tem. me [to whom I said] Saw

כִּמְעַט֙ <WH4592> kim-'At [It was] but a little שֶׁעָבַ֣רְתִּי <WH5674> she-'a-Var-ti that I passed מֵהֶ֔ם <WH1992> me-Hem, like עַ֣ד <WH5704> 'ad Until שֶֽׁמָּצָ֔אתִי <WH4672> shem-ma-Tza-ti, from them but I found אֵ֥ת <WH853> 'et שֶׁאָהֲבָ֖ה <WH157> she-'a-ha-Vah loveth נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> naf-Shi; him whom my soul אֲחַזְתִּיו֙ <WH270> 'a-chaz-Tiv I held וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo not אַרְפֶּ֔נּוּ <WH7503> 'ar-Pen-nu, him and would not let him go עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- Until שֶׁ֤הֲבֵיאתִיו֙ <WH935> she-ha-vei-tiv until I had brought אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit house אִמִּ֔י <WH517> 'im-Mi, him into my mother's וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and חֶ֖דֶר <WH2315> Che-der and into the chamber הוֹרָתִֽי׃ <WH2029> ho-ra-Ti. of her that conceived

הִשְׁבַּ֨עְתִּי <WH7650> hish-Ba'-ti I charge אֶתְכֶ֜ם <WH853> 'et-Chem בְּנ֤וֹת <WH1323> be-Not you O ye daughters יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim of Jerusalem בִּצְבָא֔וֹת <WH6643> bitz-va-'ot, by the roes א֖וֹ <WH176> o and בְּאַיְל֣וֹת <WH355> be-'ay-Lot by the hinds הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> has-sa-Deh; of the field אִם־ <WH518> 'im- you will not תָּעִ֧ירוּ׀ <WH5782> ta-'I-ru that ye stir not up וְֽאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- or תְּעֽוֹרְר֛וּ <WH5782> te-'or-Ru nor awake אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאַהֲבָ֖ה <WH160> ha-'a-ha-Vah [my] love עַ֥ד <WH5704> 'ad Until שֶׁתֶּחְפָּֽץ׃ <WH2654> shet-tech-Patz. till he please ס sa-Mek

מִ֣י <WH4310> mi What זֹ֗את <WH2063> Zot, likewise עֹלָה֙ <WH5927> 'o-Lah Who [is] this that cometh מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַמִּדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> ham-mid-Bar, out of the wilderness כְּתִֽימֲר֖וֹת <WH8490> ke-ti-ma-Rot like pillars עָשָׁ֑ן <WH6227> 'a-Shan; of smoke מְקֻטֶּ֤רֶת <WH6999> me-kut-Te-ret perfumed מוֹר֙ <WH4753> mOr with myrrh וּלְבוֹנָ֔ה <WH3828> u-le-vo-Nah, and frankincense מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> mik-Kol all אַבְקַ֥ת <WH81> 'av-Kat with all powders רוֹכֵֽל׃ <WH7402> ro-Chel. of the merchant

הִנֵּ֗ה <WH2009> hin-Neh, Behold מִטָּתוֹ֙ <WH4296> mit-ta-To Behold his bed שֶׁלִּשְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> shel-lish-lo-Moh, which [is] Solomon's שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <WH8346> shish-Shim threescore גִּבֹּרִ֖ים <WH1368> gib-bo-Rim valiant סָבִ֣יב <WH5439> sa-Viv men [are] about לָ֑הּ Lah; מִגִּבֹּרֵ֖י <WH1368> mig-gib-bo-Rei it of the valiant יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

כֻּלָּם֙ <WH3605> kul-Lam All אֲחֻ֣זֵי <WH270> 'a-Chu-zei They all hold חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> Che-rev, swords מְלֻמְּדֵ֖י <WH3925> me-lum-me-Dei [being] expert מִלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> mil-cha-Mah; in war אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every man חַרְבּוֹ֙ <WH2719> char-Bo [hath] his sword עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- at יְרֵכ֔וֹ <WH3409> ye-re-Cho, upon his thigh מִפַּ֖חַד <WH6343> mip-Pa-chad because of fear בַּלֵּילֽוֹת׃ <WH3915> bal-lei-Lot. in the night ס sa-Mek

אַפִּרְי֗וֹן <WH668> ap-pir-Yon, himself a chariot עָ֤שָׂה <WH6213> 'A-sah made לוֹ֙ lo הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech King שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> she-lo-Moh, Solomon מֵעֲצֵ֖י <WH6086> me-'a-Tzei of the wood הַלְּבָנֽוֹן׃ <WH3844> hal-le-va-Non. of Lebanon

עַמּוּדָיו֙ <WH5982> 'am-mu-Dav the pillars עָ֣שָׂה <WH6213> 'A-sah He made כֶ֔סֶף <WH3701> Che-sef, thereof [of] silver רְפִידָת֣וֹ <WH7507> re-fi-da-To the bottom זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> za-Hav, thereof [of] gold מֶרְכָּב֖וֹ <WH4817> mer-ka-Vo the covering אַרְגָּמָ֑ן <WH713> 'ar-ga-Man; of it [of] purple תּוֹכוֹ֙ <WH8432> to-Cho the midst רָצ֣וּף <WH7528> ra-Tzuf thereof being paved אַהֲבָ֔ה <WH160> 'a-ha-Vah, [with] love מִבְּנ֖וֹת <WH1323> mib-be-Not for the daughters יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim. of Jerusalem

צְאֶ֧ינָה׀ <WH3318> tze-'Ei-nah Go forth וּֽרְאֶ֛ינָה <WH7200> u-re-'Ei-nah and behold בְּנ֥וֹת <WH1323> be-Not O ye daughters צִיּ֖וֹן <WH6726> tzi-Yon of Zion בַּמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> bam-Me-lech king שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <WH8010> she-lo-Moh; Solomon בָּעֲטָרָ֗ה <WH5850> ba-'a-ta-Rah, with the crown שֶׁעִטְּרָה־ <WH5849> she-'it-te-rah- crowned לּ֤וֹ lo אִמּוֹ֙ <WH517> im-Mo wherewith his mother בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom him in the day חֲתֻנָּת֔וֹ <WH2861> cha-tun-na-To, of his espousals וּבְי֖וֹם <WH3117> u-ve-Yom and in the day שִׂמְחַ֥ת <WH8057> sim-Chat of the gladness לִבּֽוֹ׃ <WH3820> lib-Bo. of his heart ס sa-Mek
